column4: can somebody help me to get 1280x800 to work on Edgy, it worked in dapper
you're going to need to be more specific.
I have 1280x800 enabled in my xorg.conf and it should work, but it won't show up in the screen resolution pane
What kind of video card do you have?
radeon x550
which driver, do you know?
i believe i'm using fglrx, and the display is on vesa
what does the "Vendor string" say on "fglrxinfo"?
vendor string?
oh wait mesa
type "fglrxinfo" in a terminal. the 2nd or 3rd line will be "OpenGL Vendor String" something something.
oh wait mesa
ok, it looks like you have two problems, then.
pastebin your xorg.conf, please, and give me the URL.
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/2510/
ok.
have you installed fglrx-control and xorg-driver-fglrx ?
yes and yes and they are updated fully
ok, give me a second. back up your xorg.conf, because I'm going to have you edit it (sudo cp /etc/X11/xorg.conf /etc/X11/xorg.conf.bak
ready
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/2511/
make the changes, then restart X. If it screws up, then replace your xorg.conf with the .bak, and we'll go another route.
thanks it worked
fantastic.
